H0.text: Water is the major source of energy for food chains.

H1.text: Air is the major source of energy for food chains.

H2.text: Sunlight is the major source of energy for food chains.

H3.text: Grass is the major source of energy for food chains.

A4.text: The existence of nearly all life on Earth is fueled by light from the Sun.

A5.text: Sunlight is a key factor in photosynthesis, the process used by plants and other autotrophic organisms to convert light energy, normally from the Sun, into chemical energy that can be used to synthesize carbohydrates and fuel the organisms' activities.
